title: Lung Detox Premium Cleanse with Herbal Ingredients - Promote Lung Health and Detoxification with Mullein, Marshmallow Root, Ginger, and Antioxidant Fruit & Energy Blend - Support Respiratory Function and Immune Health - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Promote lung health and detoxification with New Lung® Lung Detox Premium Cleanse. Our advanced formula supports respiratory health by combining powerful herbal ingredients known for their lung-cleansing properties. Ideal for those exposed to pollutants or seeking enhanced lung health, this supplement helps remove toxins, reduce inflammation, and improve overall respiratory function.

Key Ingredients and Their Benefits

  • Mullein: Reduces respiratory inflammation, promoting easier breathing.
  • Marshmallow Root: Soothes mucous membranes, supporting lung health.
  • Ginger: Anti-inflammatory that aids lung function.
  • Molybdenum: Essential for detoxification.
  • Lutein and Lycopene: Protects lung tissue from oxidative stress.
  • Stinging Nettle Extract: Reduces respiratory irritation.
  • Saw Palmetto: Supports respiratory function.
  • Antioxidant Fruit & Energy Blend: Protects lung tissue and enhances energy.
  • Echinacea Purpurea Extract: Boosts immune function.
  • Beta Glucan: Enhances immune defense.
  • Spirulina Powder: Supports overall health and immune function.
  • Garlic: Boosts immune function and aids detoxification.

Why Choose New Lung® Lung Detox Premium Cleanse?

  • Supports Lung Health: Cleanses and protects lungs, removing toxins.
  • Reduces Inflammation: Promotes easier breathing.
  • Boosts Immune Function: Enhances body’s natural defenses.
  • Natural and Safe: High-quality, natural ingredients without artificial additives.
  • Comprehensive Support: Holistic approach to lung health.
Breathe Easier with New Lung® Invest in your respiratory health with New Lung® Lung Detox Premium Cleanse. Experience the benefits of natural ingredients designed to promote optimal lung health and overall well-being.
